title: Daily reminder that we got a new beautiful SR
body: it's been over a year and im still marveling at it's beauty. Seriously gj Riot

replies.body: I disagree personally. I like the old map a lot better. It was way more colorful and immersive. The new map is very dull and bland. The whole thing is brown and green with no other colors anywhere. Meh, i just think its ugly
